items.name: Nouadhibou Marine Eco-Park
items.short_description: Discover the vibrant underwater world of Mauritania's coast at this state-of-the-art eco-park, featuring interactive exhibits and observation tanks dedicated to local marine biodiversity.
items.address: Route de Cansado, Pointe de la Baie, Nouadhibou

items.name: Dune Sunset Lounge & Eatery
items.short_description: Perched on a low dune overlooking the Atlantic, this chic lounge offers breathtaking sunset views, artisanal cocktails, and a fusion menu of local and international flavors.
items.address: Corniche Ouest, Plage des Pêcheurs, Nouadhibou

items.name: Nouadhibou Port & Heritage Museum
items.short_description: Explore Nouadhibou's rich maritime history and cultural heritage through captivating exhibits, old navigation tools, and stories of its bustling port. An educational journey for all ages.
items.address: Quai des Minéraliers, Port Autonome, Nouadhibou

items.name: Al-Waha Modern Souk
items.short_description: A contemporary market blending traditional charm with modern comforts. Find authentic Mauritanian handicrafts, textiles, spices, and unique souvenirs in a vibrant, air-conditioned setting.
items.address: Avenue de la République, Quartier Centre, Nouadhibou

items.name: Starlight Desert Glamp Camp
items.short_description: Escape the city lights for an unparalleled stargazing experience. Luxurious tents, traditional Mauritanian hospitality, and clear desert skies make for an unforgettable overnight adventure.
items.address: Périphérie Sud-Est, Piste du Désert, Nouadhibou

items.name: AquaWave Water Sports Center
items.short_description: Hit the waves and explore the bay with kayaks, paddleboards, and kitesurfing lessons. A perfect spot for adrenaline junkies and water enthusiasts of all skill levels.

items.name: Fisherman's Wharf Promenade
items.short_description: Stroll along the revitalized waterfront, enjoying fresh seafood from local vendors, lively entertainment, and panoramic views of fishing boats returning with their daily catch.
items.address: Boulevard du Port, face au Marché Central, Nouadhibou

items.name: Nouadhibou Art & Culture Hub
items.short_description: A dynamic space showcasing contemporary Mauritanian art and hosting cultural workshops. Experience local creativity and connect with the vibrant artistic community.
items.address: Rue du Sahara, Quartier des Artisans, Nouadhibou

items.name: Coastal Bird Sanctuary Viewpoint
items.short_description: An elevated observation deck providing exceptional views of the protected wetlands, home to numerous migratory bird species. A haven for nature lovers and birdwatchers.
items.address: Zone Humide de la Baie, Nord de la Ville, Nouadhibou

items.name: The Lighthouse Café & Bistro
items.short_description: Enjoy freshly brewed coffee, light meals, and delicious pastries with a stunning panoramic view of the Atlantic Ocean and the historic lighthouse. A tranquil escape.
items.address: Cap Blanc, près du Phare, Nouadhibou
